snippet: Ignoring threats and adoption requests, the Copenhagen Zoo ended the life of a 2-year-old giraffe and fed him to the lions, saying his genes were well represented in European zoos.
abstract: Animal rights activists react in anger after Copenhagen Zoo kills healthy 2-year-old giraffe and feeds him to lions and other big cats; rights groups had mounted last-minute campaign to save giraffe, which zoo says it killed in order to ensure good gene diversity and healthy giraffe population.
lead_paragraph: Ignoring threats and adoption requests, the Copenhagen Zoo ended the life of a 2-year-old giraffe and fed him to the lions, saying his genes were well represented in European zoos.

headline.main: Anger Erupts After Danish Zoo Kills a ‘Surplus’ Giraffe
headline.print_headline: Anger Erupts After Danish Zoo Kills a ‘Surplus’ Giraffe
